keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making immigration work for Britain - with an Australian-style points-based system.
Protecting the winter fuel allowance, free bus passes and pensions.

issues.brexitEurope: We'll get Brexit done with our deal that's ready to go from day one of a new parliament. It protects jobs and trade. Ends uncertainty. And means we can lift our country out of this rut - and get on with the priorities that we all share.
issues.education: A future where your children get a world-class education - because no school is underfunded or left behind.
issues.government: We'll get a parliament that works for you.
issues.health: 50 million more GP surgery appointments. Our NHS has the extra funding it needs to thrive.
issues.immigration: Making immigration work for Britain - with an Australian-style points-based system.
issues.socialWelfare: Protecting the winter fuel allowance, free bus passes and pensions.

community.content: A future where your streets are safe no matter where you live - because our police have the officers they need to get a grip on crime.

endorsements.endorsement: We can unleash Britain’s potential. But it starts with you. At this election, vote to get on with the country's priorities. Vote Conservative.

quotes.text: No more gridlock. No more delays. It's time to get stuff done.

images.caption: Protecting the winter fuel allowance, free bus passes and pensions.
Making immigration work for Britain - with an Australian-style points-based system.

examples: 50 million more GP surgery appointments.
20,000 extra police officers.
We were only nine seats short of a majority.
We can deliver the change this country needs.
A future where you don’t have to wait three weeks for a GP appointment - because our NHS has the extra funding it needs to thrive.
A future where your streets are safe no matter where you live - because our police have the officers they need to get a grip on crime.
A future where your children get a world-class education - because no school is underfunded or left behind.
It’s time to get on with the country’s priorities. Don't you think it’s time to stop arguing about the past and start building the kind of future we want?
Let’s be honest. The country has been stuck in a rut.
Let’s get a parliament that works for you.
We can unleash Britain’s potential. But it starts with you.
A future where your streets are safe no matter where you live - because our police have the officers they need to get a grip on crime.

Let’s be honest. The country has been stuck in a rut.
It’s time to get on with the country’s priorities. Don't you think it’s time to stop arguing about the past and start building the kind of future we want?
We can unleash Britain’s potential. But it starts with you.
We'll get a parliament that works for you.
We can unleash Britain’s potential. But it starts with you. At this election, vote to get on with the country's priorities. Vote Conservative.
Let’s be honest. The country has been stuck in a rut.
And because all the other parties have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives, a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister.
